price: Basi angalia ulivyo kuwa mwisho wa mipango yao, ya kwamba tuliwaangamiza wao pamoja na watu wao wote.
arabic: فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ مَكۡرِهِمۡ أَنَّا دَمَّرۡنَٰهُمۡ وَقَوۡمَهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Hebu tazama vipi yalikuwa matokeo ya mipango yao na mipango yetu. Sisi tuliwaangamiza wote hao wao na kaumu yao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-unẓur kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu makrihim annā dammarnāhum waqawmahum ajmaʿīna
